name: Adaptive Strategy
flavor_text: The tenets of the Codex Astartes allow for unorthodox use of combat tactics and the employment of divergent strategic doctrines if doing so will lead to victory.

rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
rules.effect: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Doctrine to be active.

name: Storm of Fire
flavor_text: There is no escaping the wrath of the Space Marines, and they use their weapons to bring swift death to their foes wherever they may hide.

rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

name: Honour the Chapter
flavor_text: Every Chapter has forged its own tales of heroism, and none of its battle-brothers would see that noble record besmirched.

rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

name: Squad Tactics
flavor_text: Space Marines know precisely when to give ground in order to leave their enemies floundering, before surging back into the fight and driving them from the field in disarray.

rules.when: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry or Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
rules.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.

name: Shock Assault
flavor_text: The Adeptus Astartes are elite troops who strike with all the speed and fury of a searing thunderbolt.

rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
rules.effect: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.
